name: Gloomfang Caverns
description: A vast network of twisting tunnels and chambers carved into the mountainside. The deeper you go, the more dangerous it becomes.

zones.name: Gloomfang Entrance
zones.description: The mouth of the caverns. Foul air and the sound of scraping claws echo from within.

zones.name: Upper Tunnels
zones.description: Winding passages where goblins have made their home. Torches flicker on the walls, casting dancing shadows.

zones.name: The Warren
zones.description: A large chamber filled with goblin nests and stolen goods. The stench of unwashed goblins is overwhelming.

zones.name: Middle Caverns
zones.description: Deeper into the mountain, the tunnels widen into natural caverns. Strange fungi grow on the walls, glowing with an eerie light.

zones.name: Guard Post
zones.description: A fortified position where goblin guards watch the deeper passages. Weapons and armor are stacked against the walls.

zones.name: Deep Tunnels
zones.description: The air grows thick and heavy. The walls are slick with moisture, and strange sounds echo from the darkness ahead.

zones.name: Deep Caverns
zones.description: The deepest part of the caverns. The temperature drops, and an ancient evil seems to permeate the very stone.

zones.name: The Abyss
zones.description: A massive chamber at the very heart of the caverns. A dark altar stands in the center, and the air itself seems to pulse with malevolent energy.
